data.name: TableValidation
desc: represents the data validation settings for a cell or cell range.

properties.name: ErrorAlertStyle
desc: specifies the style of the error message.
This is used only if TableValidation.ShowErrorMessage is set to TRUE.

properties.name: ErrorMessage
desc: specifies the text of the error message.
This is only used if TableValidation.ShowErrorMessage is set to TRUE.

properties.name: ErrorTitle
desc: specifies the title of the window showing the error message.
This is only used if TableValidation.ShowErrorMessage is set to TRUE.

properties.name: IgnoreBlankCells
desc: specifies if blank cells should be allowed.

properties.name: InputMessage
desc: specifies the text of the input message.
This is only used if TableValidation.ShowInputMessage is set to TRUE.

properties.name: InputTitle
desc: specifies the title of the window showing the input message.
This is only used if TableValidation.ShowInputMessage is set to TRUE.

properties.name: ShowErrorMessage
desc: specifies if an error message is displayed when invalid data is entered.

properties.name: ShowInputMessage
desc: specifies if an input message is shown when the cursor is in a cell with these validation settings.

properties.name: ShowList
desc: specifies if the list of possible values should be shown on the cell and how.
